content:
#  Business offer -- AGH UST 

URL: https://agh.edu.pl/en/research-cooperation/business-offer
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:07:36

Skip to content ↓

 Business offer 

Our doors are always open for those who want to establish cooperation with
the AGH University. Our university provides the infrastructure to conduct research,
delivers specialised expert opinions, and provides substantive support.
In establishing cooperation, we broaden our scientific horizons and expand towards interdisciplinary growth, implementing the most interesting projects to the market.

 Order expert reports, opinions, and analyses 

Solve a technological problem with our specialist support.

 Investigate the world in our laboratories 

Use our extensive infrastructure, including accredited laboratories.

 Get involved in fostering innovation – START-UP 

We connect investors and your needs with innovative teams in START-UPs.

An online database with the research offer of the AGH University was launched. The system contains information on the university research infrastructure and its capabilities. The project was implemented within the IDUB programme.
